Title: Ribbed Racer T-Shirt
Subtitle: This racer vest is a great option for speedy styling!
Description: Looking to stock up on your summer essentials? Well add this racer T-shirt to your collection to enjoy a classic summer style that will never go out of fashion! Curated from a soft breathable fabric, it has a comfy crew neckline and thick shoulder straps to create the racer silhouette that we know and love. Available in multiple colourways, we’re sure you’ll find one that suits your aesthetic (although when they’re this staple, we wouldn’t blame you if you bought every colour!). The versatility of this racer top means that you can tailor it to suit pretty much any occasion. Layer it with a shirt and tailored trousers for a smart look or keep it casual and tuck it into tapered jeans, now that’s what we call effortless styling!
